Ngoy Lusungu Serge, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Serge Le Griot, bụ onye Congo na-eti egwu, onye na-ede uri, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-ede blọgụ si mpaghara North Kivu.

A mụrụ Ngoy Lusungu Serge, nke a maara dị ka "Serge Le Griot", n'ụbọchị 12 nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1995 n'obodo Goma (North Kivu), na ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Democratic Republic of the Congo. N'ịbụ onye nwere mmasị na uri nke oge a site na nwata, ọ malitere n'ụlọ ihe nkiri
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gasịrị na ìgwè "Echos des plumes" nke ebe ọdịbendị nke Goma, n'afọ 2014 malitere n'ime slam iji nye olu na ederede ndị a zoro ezo ogologo oge na akwụkwọ edemede
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ hapụrụ obodo ya gaa biri na isi obodo Burundi mbụ, obodo Bujumbura, maka ihe ọmụmụ ihe.
Serge Le Griot zutere ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe mgbe ọ na-eme nzere ogo bachelọ ya na injinịa obodo na Mahadum Bujumbura Light

Ọ matara onye Chadian slammer Croque-mort, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Kader na ndị French slammers Rouda na Lyor gụnyere Rouda bụ ndị kpaliri ya ịmepụta, ya na ndị slammers iri na anọ ndị ọzọ sitere na mpaghara ahụ, nchịkọta Jewe Slam N'afọ 2018, ndị otu a sonyere na nke mbụ ya na iko Afrịka nke slam-poetry ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nke asọmpi ahụ na mpaghara Afrịka nke Great Lakes.

N'afọ 2018, Serge Le Griot wepụtara abọm Slam mbụ ya nke nwere ụdị egwu isii ọhụrụ a na-akpọ "Afroslamusic". O si otú a bụrụ onye mbụ na-ese egwu slam si Central Africa wepụta abọm na isi iyi nke mkpali maka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ga-eso
A na-eme atụmatụ maka abọm nke abụọ ya nke akpọrọ "Shauku" n'afọ 2020.
